National Institutes of Health.Description: The National Institutes of Health provides funding to the National Cancer Institute for cancer research and treatment.

National Institutes of Health.Object: National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases
National Institutes of Health.Description: The National Institutes of Health collaborates with the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases to study and combat infectious diseases.
The National Institutes of Health conducts research on mental health disorders through the National Institute of Mental Health.

National Institutes of Health.Object: National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases
National Institutes of Health.Description: The National Institutes of Health conducts research on diabetes, digestive disorders, and kidney diseases through the National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases.
